channel.title: Whonix Download Files Verification
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I´m having big problems verifying the Whonix Workstation and Gateaway Download image!
All Tutorials in the Whonix Manuals are totally confusing...
I actually downloaded Whonix Gateaway and Workstation and the .asc files for each one. How can I verify them using windows?

item.title: Whonix Download Files Verification
item.dc:creator: MaxMusterman
item.description:
Thank you for your fast reply!

I will try this by using the command line as explained in the Wiki

Best regards

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix Download Files Verification
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

The easiest way to do so is by using the command line as explaine here: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox/Verify_the_virtual_machine_images_using_the_command_line

Maybe you are interested in the Whonix-Installer which automates a lot of tasks on Windows: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Windows

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
